Reviews.Content: stayed wedding anniversary kids location walking distance orchard road easy hail cabs little tired hotel obviously checkin staff attentive rest staff bell hop pool towels maybe pool centre piece hotel

Reviews.Title: “Dated...but good location”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights found hotel dated hotel cater asian tourist included breakfast wide selection east meets west hotel located thin 5 minutes walk newton shopping mall mrt skip hop rest singapore singapore hotels becoming increasingly expensive budget hotel orchard road expensive reasonable choice ad paid

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Heather R
Reviews.Content: hotel location walk nearest mrt station adequate hotel check little bit slow free drinks voucher breakfast excellent variety fill lunchtime restaurant meals quality ok value money swimming pool exactly appealing bit shame humidity meant fancied refreshing dip

Reviews.Title: “Good location but .....”
Reviews.Author: imax_12
Reviews.Content: book hotel agoda stayed 7 nights spending holiday vacation front desk slow guest check deeds upgrading family suite found 501 dusty spaces yes furniture curtains dirty carpets retiring staying 1 hour kids suffer asthma attacks allergy demanded night time transferred 8th floor ok clean dusty smell dont coming stayed 3 nights wondering kids coughing stuffy nose especially whenever aircondition discovered transferred smoking floor stupid people transfered smoking primary reason allergies dust besides requested hand smoking logical 2 kids cant imagine demanded transfer transfered smoking floor little improvement carpets air surrounding floor airconditioned improve front desk transfered smoking usual provide straight answer internet acces expensive buy wifi card continously reasonable food ok breakfast location rest dissapointing remember bed covers bed blood stains im rate hotel 5 2 hope review help people

Reviews.Title: “An OK stay in an expensive city”
Reviews.Author: Dee V
Reviews.Content: relatively midrange hotel terms hotel cost interiors sprucing loud gold chinese lettering loud fountain etc ok lobby funny smell probably emitting rickshaw coffee shop lot food prepared sesame oil pleasantly surprised breakfast tasty presentation mediocre pancakes delicious bacon overdone days prepared sweet sour prawns rice 1130 night day sight seeing reception moments attendant helpful attendees preoccupied ignoring attention attendant refused ownership locked missed check time twice locking cardkey time overall rickshaw restaurant start day quick snack recommend eating city folk near mrt stations buses short distances main attractions helps saving money traveling spend ventures singapore

Reviews.Title: “At the Heart of Singapore”
Reviews.Author: Basu123
Reviews.Content: located heart singapores business minutes renowned shopping entertainment centre orchard road reached 30 minutes changi airport comfotable walking distance novena mrt station hotel facilities leisure traveler reasonable price hotel caters nice resturants service 24 hr tv channels wifi internet connectivity ample car parking space hotel liked tourist business travellers

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: tdbt1016
Reviews.Content: am glad stayed 1 night layover bali 2 weeks ago formula weekend reception average excited receptionist warned potential noise issue experience due construction 16th floor didnt experience noise nonsmoking entering tell people chained smoked reeked smelly dirty feel beds 2 twin beds shouldve chucked time ago mattress thin literally springs poking pile linens top bed provide cushion husband slept 1 twin bed bathroom ok sign close proximity train station thats book stay motel 6 actually standards

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing, needs a serious makeover.”
Reviews.Author: Sarah0312
Reviews.Content: impression bell boy luggage arrival check ages service ive received entering dropped honest actually cried looking forward singapore leg trip booked hotel cheaper offer wasnt cheap begin furniture dusty carpet lumps fluff shower warm ok shower head rail rusty replacement tv modern flat screen fine modern bed hard slept tiredness quality bed sheets brown scratchy blanket putting main concern bedroom air con actually dripping water im ashamed didnt report time night hungry service cheese sandwich fries brought 15 minutes wasnt cheap location ok short walk novena mrt station definitely learnt lesson dont book hotel price price paid wasnt value money pay standard

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare”
Reviews.Author: jmk10ho
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel june 2010 3 nights location 5 minutes walk novena mrt station reason picked hotel hotel happy getting hotel nightmare happened night woke middle night noise light tv roommate fast asleep using remote tv own using remote repeated happened eventually pissed walked towards tv unplugged wasnt scared moment sleepy scared heck talked roommate morning third nights heard people singing karaoke 1 2 am checked fourth day complained front desk lady karaoke lounge upstairs talked coworkers staying upstairs heard throughout night cleaning staff didnt replace towels day towels roommate towel shower 10 minutes housekeeping towels overall speaking avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this place at all costs, A tent is better than this”
Reviews.Author: scott167
Reviews.Content: hotel worn fashioned uncomfortable worst staff met hotel ignore shabby 3 4 english tv channels internet paid 85 sd hour log expires hour try charge filling items fridge mattress broken cigarette holes sheets restaurant filthy believe bad avoid costs

Reviews.Title: “great location, but moldy smell in the room”
Reviews.Author: linusbon
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 days business trip hotel 5minute walking distance newton mrt station located shopping mall restaurants food court location spacious moldy smell pretty strong called front desk complain housekeeper kept ac day help bit buffet breakfast okay variety fruit omelet station

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel for the price & great Location”
Reviews.Author: Angie662228
Reviews.Content: little concerned booking people slated hotel found nicenot luxury price included breakfast excellent newton mrt literally 2 minute walk nice shops value supermarket lower ground shops harrys bar etc shops inc starbucks department stores road convenient paths takes trying cross busy road residential quiet city hall orchard 2 stops centre visiting son couple months impressed hotel excellent location stay

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous mobility options”

Reviews.Content: welcomed loads luggage reception tied red rope sit sister checking inthe reception noisy added chaos nice except air conditioning loud times cleaned despite active dnd housekeeping staff denied active dnd breakfast value moneybut getting table bit playing musical empty tables sight occupied mine course stay realized getting breakfast 8 10 option bit hotel bus stop taxi stand outside hotel mrt 4 minute walk travelling singapore easy staff courteous allowed late check 12noon swimming pool shut renovation

Reviews.Title: “Nightmarish experience in a terrible and unfriendly hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Yathiri
Reviews.Content: hotel royal newton road singapore june 2010 booked hotel online family stay charged exorbitant rates checked staff nightmare started thereafter towels toilet torn shreds service poor staff unfriendly rude compared hotels offer free buffet breakfast welcome drink water bottles charged staff front office lobby unprofessional overall stay unpleasant live upto hotel hotel suitable leisure stay airport touristic city

Reviews.Content: rm ready arrival upgraded rm worth waiting apologetic friendly complimentary drink breakfast breakfast lacks taste walking distance hotel newton square velocity shopping centre indulge gourmet food food galore sgd ideal shopping spree
